content: update this pattern is currently being re-tested to remove the errors as well as adding in more complete notes and warnings where the asymmetry occurs it seems many folks are having issues around row 21 so i am revisiting it with the aid of a few wonderful folks there will also be a chart available to help clarify the stitch pattern i thank you for your patience and i also reiterate that if you are having trouble with this pattern please contact me the more information i have the better and easier it will be for me or any other designer for that matter to fix the problem this pattern may now be accessed at my newest blog homegrownandhomespun ostrich feather fandango shawl pattern 1 please be certain to read all the notes on that page before endeavoring to attempt the pattern i ve had several people complain because it is not truly symmetrical among other things though the finished project looks symmetrical once you reach row 15 or 16 it then turns into a 5-6 row repeat thereby making it a bit more challenging if you are a visual person the pattern will be very easy to figure out as far as placing the various shells also if you have questions regarding this pattern please feel free to contact me via the email address given on the pattern page as i cannot always access ravelry during the daytime thank you 1 http //homegrownandhomespun wordpress com/about/free-crochet-patterns/ostrich-feather-fandango-shawl/
